record.title: NATIONAL DAY OF THE AMERICAN COWBOY

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to Calendar No. 153, S. Res. 130.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
